title: Soooooo many client issues
body:
I get really frustrating problems with the client like
1. Disconnecting from pvp.net
2. Delays between queue and pregame screen (makes it hard to get pref position in solo queue)
3. And client crashes

I don't want it to seem like I'm crying over spilled milk but the 20 min leaver busters I get that result from Number 1 and 3 are frustrating me and I feel like now is the time I see that it stops.

Thank You for reading, Manny1322

replies.body:
From your screenshot, it looks like you're not only disconnecting from the PVP.net service, but also the game platform entirely. This would definitely have a high chance to cause crashes of the client anywhere before champ select. An unstable connection to the servers is typically the main cause of this to happen, which Rineyy has offered a great guide to address.

Should you still have issues after working through the connection guide Rineyy linked, let me know.
